title: Where are screenshots saved on my computer? - Quora

response.answer_text: This really depends on how you take your screenshot. On my laptop, I typically press windows key+print screen which captures the whole screen. If this is how you took screenshots, you can find them in a folder called “Screenshots”. Another method is where you press print screen and you crop out the area which you want to take a screen shot. Then a notification from snipping tool will appear and you can then edit and save your screenshot. Hopes this helps. Edit: I forgot to add that if you press the print screen button and screenshot, your image will also be saved to the clipboard, where you can get it from pressing Ctrl V.

Depends on how the screenshot is taken.Though since you mention this, I wanna recommend a tool to you.Start using Lightshot for your screenshots instead. Definitely a better program than default ‘Print Screen’ images.You can set the save location so the screenshots you take are easily accessed instead of stumbling around your whole PC to find them.
